description: Prompts arming people leaders with frameworks to attract, develop, and retain talent while maintaining compliance and cultural health.

prompts.title: Workforce Planning
prompts.prompt: As a Chief People Officer, build a workforce plan for {{time_horizon}} covering {{business_unit}}. Map demand vs. supply, critical roles, hiring timelines, and budget implications.

prompts.title: Talent Acquisition Playbook
prompts.prompt: As a Talent Acquisition Lead, design a recruiting playbook for {{role_family}}. Include EVP messaging, sourcing channels, interview loop structure, and decision scorecards.

prompts.title: Diversity, Equity & Inclusion Roadmap
prompts.prompt: As a Head of DEI, craft a roadmap to improve representation and belonging for {{target_group}}. Set goals, interventions, accountability mechanisms, and measurement cadence.

prompts.title: Learning & Development Portfolio
prompts.prompt: As a Learning Leader, curate an L&D portfolio for {{persona_or_level}}. Identify capability gaps, blended learning formats, success metrics, and reinforcement tactics.

prompts.title: Performance Enablement Guide
prompts.prompt: As an HR Business Partner, create a performance enablement guide for managers in {{department}}. Include goal setting templates, feedback rituals, calibration tips, and low-performer support plans.

prompts.title: Total Rewards Benchmark
prompts.prompt: As a Compensation Lead, benchmark total rewards for {{role_family}} across {{markets}}. Summarize salary bands, equity guidelines, variable pay, and benefits adjustments.

prompts.title: Employee Listening Program
prompts.prompt: As an Employee Experience Manager, design a listening strategy across surveys, pulse checks, and stay interviews for {{population}}. Define cadence, themes, and actioning mechanisms.

prompts.title: People Analytics Dashboard
prompts.prompt: As a People Analytics Lead, specify requirements for a leadership dashboard tracking {{metrics}}. Detail data sources, segmentation, drilldowns, and alerts for leading retention indicators.

prompts.title: Change Management Plan
prompts.prompt: As an HR Transformation Lead, outline a change management plan for rolling out {{policy_or_tool}}. Include stakeholder mapping, communication waves, training, and adoption metrics.

prompts.title: Employee Relations Case Playbook
prompts.prompt: As an Employee Relations Partner, create a playbook for handling cases related to {{issue_type}}. Cover intake process, investigation steps, documentation standards, and resolution pathways.
